mapper.update: UPDATE dashboard_job SET job_name = #{name}, cron_exp = #{cronExp}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, job_type = #{jobType}, job_config = #{config} WHERE job_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT j.job_id AS id, j.user_id AS userId, j.job_name AS name, j.start_date AS startDate, j.end_date AS endDate, j.job_type AS jobType, j.job_config AS config, j.cron_exp AS cronExp, j.last_exec_time AS lastExecTime, j.exec_log AS execLog, (select u.user_name from dashboard_user u where u.user_id = j.user_id) as userName, j.job_status AS jobStatus FROM dashboard_job j WHERE j.job_id = #{jobId}

SELECT j.job_id AS id, j.user_id AS userId, j.job_name AS name, j.start_date AS startDate, j.end_date AS endDate, j.job_type AS jobType, j.job_config AS config, j.cron_exp AS cronExp, j.last_exec_time AS lastExecTime, j.exec_log AS execLog, (select u.user_name from dashboard_user u where u.user_id = j.user_id) as userName, j.job_status AS jobStatus FROM dashboard_job j WHERE #{userId} = '1' OR j.user_id = #{userId} OR j.job_id IN ( SELECT res_id FROM dashboard_user_role ur LEFT JOIN dashboard_role_res rr ON ur.role_id = rr.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND rr.res_type = 'job' ) ORDER BY j.job_id DESC
